name: Phoenix Retaliation
description:
Phoenix Retaliation

Note: I made this game in just 8 hours.

Story Line:

As the last surviving member of your tribe, You are determined to take revenge for the senseless destruction of your village and triangles. The once peaceful, blue triangle village was invaded by the merciless pink triangles under the cover of darkness, slaughtering your kin and destroying your home. With nothing left to lose, you, the Blue Phoenix, take up your gun and set out on a quest for retaliation. Every step of the way is fraught with danger as you navigate through the dark and foreboding terrain, facing numerous obstacles and confronting enemies at every turn. Your determination and unwavering spirit are the only things keeping you alive as you strive to bring justice to those who have wronged you, and ensure that your tribe's memory lives on. Will you be able to face the hordes of pink triangles and emerge victorious? Only time will tell.

The End of my Tribe, is the beginning of ALL OUT WAR. The pink tribe is gonna regret their act of killing FOREVER.  - Blue Phoenix Controls:
  • Aim : Mouse
  • Shoot : Click
  • Movement : Arrow Keys
  • Note: While jumping, time slows down!
  • You have to survive for as long as you can! Good Luck!
More Info:
  • Intense combat
  • Geometery
  • Survival
  • Shooter
  • Stealth and strategy
  • All assets made by me!
